text:
活动主题：我在千岛湖看到了一场水上举办的婚礼表演，现场真的太美了
活动时间：10月26日（星期五）14：30-16：00
活动地点：千岛湖秀水广场
需要拍摄的画面：主人公出镜，婚礼表演，红毯风采，舞龙舞狮、跳竹马，观看《爱情之城》宣传片，三敬之礼、盟誓发愿仪式，观看《千岛湖旅拍大赏Vlog》等。。
画面要求：横屏拍摄，画质1080p，画面内容包括人物出镜及活动现场空镜，画面美观，收音清晰。
关键词：婚礼，浪漫，爱情，特别的中式婚礼
trans:
Activity theme: I saw a wedding show held on the water in Qiandao Lake, which was really beautiful
Activity time: October 26 (Friday) 14:30-16:00
Venue: Xiushui Square, Qiandao Lake
Scenes to be filmed: the main characters' appearance, wedding performance, red carpet show, dragon and lion dances,  bamboo horse dance, watching the promotional video of "City of Love", the ritual of three tributes, the swearing and wishing ceremony, and watching the "Qiandao Lake Traveling Photography Vlog".
Screen requirements: horizontal screen shooting, 1080p image quality, screen content including character appearances and scenery shots of the event, beautiful images, and clear radio reception.
Key words: wedding, romance, love, special Chinese wedding
